{"id":968887976,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1686490419,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"19 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/968887976/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Semi-Ordered Permutation","memory":"46.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int semiOrderedPermutation(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n=nums.size(),x=-1,y=-1;\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            if(nums[i]==1)\n            x=i;\n            if(nums[i]==n)\n            y=i;\n            if(x!=-1 && y!=-1)\n            break;\n        }\n        return(x>y?x+n-y-2:x+n-y-1);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"semi-ordered-permutation","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
